open.l1: AC path opens or local filtering is removed.
open.l2: Noise and ripple propagation increase into dependent nodes.

short.description: Capacitor behaves like a low-impedance fault.
short.l1: Connected nets are forced together at low impedance.
short.l2: Bias collapse or supply loading may trigger multi-node failure signatures.

capacitance_low.l1: Time constants shorten and filtering weakens.
capacitance_low.l2: Dynamic stability margins degrade under transient loading.

leakage_high.description: Deterministic failure assumption for capacitor mode 'leakage high'.
leakage_high.l1: Primary propagation: directly connected nets and bias points shift based on topology.
leakage_high.l2: Secondary propagation: downstream interfaces, margins, and detection paths are impacted.

esr_high.description: Equivalent series resistance rises beyond expected.
esr_high.l1: Ripple attenuation and pulse-current support degrade.
esr_high.l2: Thermal self-heating and cross-stage noise coupling increase.

capacitance_high.description: Deterministic failure assumption for capacitor mode 'capacitance high'.
capacitance_high.l1: Primary propagation: directly connected nets and bias points shift based on topology.
capacitance_high.l2: Secondary propagation: downstream interfaces, margins, and detection paths are impacted.

open.description: Deterministic failure assumption for diode mode 'open'.
open.l1: Primary propagation: directly connected nets and bias points shift based on topology.
open.l2: Secondary propagation: downstream interfaces, margins, and detection paths are impacted.

short.description: Deterministic failure assumption for diode mode 'short'.
short.l1: Primary propagation: directly connected nets and bias points shift based on topology.
short.l2: Secondary propagation: downstream interfaces, margins, and detection paths are impacted.

leakage_high.l2: Secondary propagation: downstream interfaces, margins, and detection paths are impacted.

vf_shift.l1: Primary propagation: directly connected nets and bias points shift based on topology.
vf_shift.l2: Secondary propagation: downstream interfaces, margins, and detection paths are impacted.

open.description: Deterministic failure assumption for diode mode 'open'.
open.l1: Primary propagation: directly connected nets and bias points shift based on topology.
open.l2: Secondary propagation: downstream interfaces, margins, and detection paths are impacted.

short.description: Deterministic failure assumption for diode mode 'short'.
short.l1: Primary propagation: directly connected nets and bias points shift based on topology.

open_contact.description: One or more interface contacts are open.
open_contact.l1: Signal or supply continuity is interrupted.
open_contact.l2: External-system observability/control degrades and appears intermittent/static.

intermittent_contact.description: Contact intermittently opens under vibration or handling.
intermittent_contact.l1: Momentary dropouts appear on interface nets.
intermittent_contact.l2: Transient faults propagate as sporadic resets, spikes, or communication loss.

high_contact_resistance.description: Deterministic failure assumption for connector mode 'high contact resistance'.
high_contact_resistance.l1: Primary propagation: directly connected nets and bias points shift based on topology.
high_contact_resistance.l2: Secondary propagation: downstream interfaces, margins, and detection paths are impacted.

miswire.description: Deterministic failure assumption for connector mode 'miswire'.
miswire.l1: Primary propagation: directly connected nets and bias points shift based on topology.
miswire.l2: Secondary propagation: downstream interfaces, margins, and detection paths are impacted.

gain_low.l1: Stage gain drops and bias point may move off center.
gain_low.l2: Signal chain compression/under-drive propagates to downstream nodes.

gain_high.description: Deterministic failure assumption for transistor mode 'gain high'.
gain_high.l1: Primary propagation: directly connected nets and bias points shift based on topology.
gain_high.l2: Secondary propagation: downstream interfaces, margins, and detection paths are impacted.

be_short.l1: Bias network is heavily loaded and control action is lost.
be_short.l2: Collector/emitter operating point collapses and output behavior saturates.

ce_short.description: Collector-emitter path is shorted or near short.
ce_short.l1: Load is forced toward supply/ground path unexpectedly.
ce_short.l2: Branch overcurrent and thermal stress can propagate into supply network.

open_collector.l2: Downstream node floats or rails, causing interface-level functional loss.

open_emitter.description: Deterministic failure assumption for transistor mode 'open emitter'.
open_emitter.l1: Primary propagation: directly connected nets and bias points shift based on topology.
open_emitter.l2: Secondary propagation: downstream interfaces, margins, and detection paths are impacted.

leakage_high.description: Deterministic failure assumption for transistor mode 'leakage high'.
leakage_high.l1: Primary propagation: directly connected nets and bias points shift based on topology.
leakage_high.l2: Secondary propagation: downstream interfaces, margins, and detection paths are impacted.

gain_low.l1: Stage gain drops and bias point may move off center.
gain_low.l2: Signal chain compression/under-drive propagates to downstream nodes.

gain_high.description: Deterministic failure assumption for transistor mode 'gain high'.
gain_high.l1: Primary propagation: directly connected nets and bias points shift based on topology.
gain_high.l2: Secondary propagation: downstream interfaces, margins, and detection paths are impacted.

be_short.l1: Bias network is heavily loaded and control action is lost.
be_short.l2: Collector/emitter operating point collapses and output behavior saturates.

ce_short.description: Collector-emitter path is shorted or near short.
ce_short.l1: Load is forced toward supply/ground path unexpectedly.
ce_short.l2: Branch overcurrent and thermal stress can propagate into supply network.

open_collector.l2: Downstream node floats or rails, causing interface-level functional loss.

open_emitter.description: Deterministic failure assumption for transistor mode 'open emitter'.
open_emitter.l1: Primary propagation: directly connected nets and bias points shift based on topology.
open_emitter.l2: Secondary propagation: downstream interfaces, margins, and detection paths are impacted.

leakage_high.description: Deterministic failure assumption for transistor mode 'leakage high'.
leakage_high.l1: Primary propagation: directly connected nets and bias points shift based on topology.
leakage_high.l2: Secondary propagation: downstream interfaces, margins, and detection paths are impacted.

open.description: Conduction path opens and current flow drops to near zero.
open.l1: Direct branch current collapses and node bias shifts.
open.l2: Downstream gain/margin can collapse; detection often visible as static offset.

short.description: Terminals effectively short and branch resistance drops strongly.
short.l1: Branch current rises and neighboring node voltage compresses.
short.l2: Upstream supply loading rises; thermal stress can propagate to adjacent parts.

oot_high.description: Resistance drifts above nominal tolerance band.
oot_high.l1: Current reduces and divider/bias point moves low.
oot_high.l2: Stage gain and headroom reduce, increasing clipping or under-drive risk.

oot_low.description: Resistance drifts below nominal tolerance band.
oot_low.l1: Current increases and divider/bias point moves high.
oot_low.l2: Power dissipation rises and later-stage bias can overdrive.

drift_high.description: Deterministic failure assumption for resistor mode 'drift high'.
drift_high.l1: Primary propagation: directly connected nets and bias points shift based on topology.
drift_high.l2: Secondary propagation: downstream interfaces, margins, and detection paths are impacted.

drift_low.description: Deterministic failure assumption for resistor mode 'drift low'.
drift_low.l1: Primary propagation: directly connected nets and bias points shift based on topology.
drift_low.l2: Secondary propagation: downstream interfaces, margins, and detection paths are impacted.

noise_excess.description: Deterministic failure assumption for resistor mode 'noise excess'.

noise_excess.l2: Secondary propagation: downstream interfaces, margins, and detection paths are impacted.

measurement_error.description: Probe setup or instrument coupling introduces error.
measurement_error.l1: Observed value diverges from actual node condition.
measurement_error.l2: Diagnostic decisions propagate incorrect fault isolation paths.

probe_slip.description: Probe contact moves to wrong node or loses contact.
probe_slip.l1: Sampled signal is discontinuous or from unintended net.
probe_slip.l2: Root-cause localization propagates to false suspects.

open_test_node.description: Test access path is open or inaccessible.
open_test_node.l2: Coverage gaps increase and detection score worsens for related failures.
